wallet.createimport.desc: Restore your existing wallet or enroll a new one
auth.wallet.register.desc: This wallet is pending activation. Click activate to begin the process
auth.wallet.registration.type.email.desc: To activate using E-Mail copy your public key and send it to {mail}
auth.error.E_INVALID_KEY: Provided key is corrupted or contains invalid data
auth.error.E_DELETEDKEY: Wallet was removed from the ecosystem
auth.error.E_OFFLINE: Could not connect to the service
auth.error.E_UPDATING: Node is updating blockchain. Try again later
auth.backup.invalid: Provided key is corrupted or contains invalid data
auth.havekey.desc: If you are already familiar with Gachain and have a backup of your private key, choose this option to guide you through the process of restoring your wallet data
auth.import.disclaimer: Please enter your wallet backup payload to restore access to the system
auth.login.guest.name: Guest
auth.login.guest.desc: Proceed with this option if you want to try Gachain in test mode
auth.nokey.desc: If you are new to the system or just want to create a new wallet, choose this option to generate a new private key and protect it with your password
auth.password.changed: Password changed. Please login with new password
auth.qrcode.desc: Use this code to import the wallet on your mobile device
auth.remove.desc: Do you really want to delete this wallet? THIS ACTION IS IRREVERSIBLE
auth.remember.disclaimer: Please make sure that you keep your passphrase (wallet seed) safe and remember the password. You will be asked to retype them for confirmation
auth.remember.disclaimer.confirm: Please repeat your registration values. This step is required to ensure that your passphrase and password are stored correctly
auth.role.disclaimer: Select role that you want to use to login. Data representation will change according to the selected role. You can switch between roles at any time
auth.session.prompt: Please enter your password to sign in
auth.welcome.continue: Press 'Create or import wallet' button to begin the process of creating or restoring your wallet
auth.welcome.guide: Before proceeding, you will be guided through the wallet creation process. This will not take too much time. After completing this process you will be able to use all features of Gachain
editor.close.confirm: Do you really want to close '{name}' without saving changes?
editor.page.name: Name
editor.revert.confirm: Do you really want to discard all changes?
general.error.notfound: The page you are looking for does not exists
general.error.page: The page you are looking for could not be processed
general.error.timeout: The page you are looking for is too heavy to be processed. Consider reducing number of database queries
general.error.socket.desc: Failed to establish connection to the WebSocket server. Check your configuration
general.notfound.page.notexists: The page you are looking for does not exists
general.title: Gachain
general.security.warning: Please use desktop version for better security
install.database.name: DB name
modal.authorization.title: Authorization
modal.authorization.password: Enter your password to sign contract {contract}
modal.confirm.title: Confirmation
modal.imageeditor.desc: Prepare your image for uploading by selecting which part of the image you want to use
modal.imageeditor.title: Image editor
modal.locale.title: Switch language
privileged.desc: You will not be prompted to enter your password when performing actions that require authorization
tx.error.E_GUEST_VIOLATION.desc: Transaction can't be executed using guest mode
tx.error.E_LIMITFORSIGN.desc: Transaction params are too heavy to execute
tx.error.E_OFFLINE.desc: Failed to connect to the server
validation.email: Value must be a valid e-mail
validation.url: Value must be a valid URL
